1: <pb/><e>Sb'it David jun tic</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal caw tan̈wj in, yujto cojxn ach tzach wa'ch yipc in c'ojol.</t>
2: <t>Tox 'ix wal 'aych Mamin Jehová to Wajlil aji, a smasnil tas wach' 'ay 'ayin, a 'aych tzcoti.</t>
3: <pb/><t>A eb' yiclum tzyutj sb'a 'a scal eb' a chon̈ab', caw wach' yic eb'. Tzin nib'j tzin 'aj 'a scal eb'.</t>
4: <t>'Oj niwtjoc syailal eb' tz'a'n servil junc xo comn dios. Ma'oj wa'ch in b'a wa'n schic'l no xajmb'al yet' eb'. May xon b'a'n̈ 'oj in b'inoc sb'i sdiosal eb' cha.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová ach tzac' smasnil tas wach' 'ay tz'och wu'uj. Ach ton tzac' smasnil tas tznib'j in c'ojol. A 'a yol a c'ab' 'ay in q'uinal.</t>
6: <t>Wach'n̈j tas x'ilchj wu'uj, caw wach' tas 'ix ac' in macloc yic tzwica'ani.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, caw tzwal wach' paxti 'ayach, yujto ach tzac' in nab'en, tzin a cuyn pax 'a junjn 'ac'wal.</t>
8: <t>Smasnil tiempo caw nab'ilchn̈ej wu'uj. 'Aych 'ec'n̈ej 'a in wach' c'ab', yuj cha matz somchj 'el in nab'en.</t>
9: <pb/><t>Caw wal tzalj in c'ojol, tzach in b'itnan 'a tzaljc'ojlal. Wach'xam 'oj cham in niwnal tic, palta wojtac to 'oj pitzwc paxi.</t>
10: <t>Yujto ma'oj actc can in pixn 'a scal eb' chamnac, ma'oj a cha c'a in niwnal an sic'b'iln 'el oj tic.</t>
11: <t>'Ix ac' wojcoc 'el jun b'e yic q'uinl 'a jun 'ejmn̈ej. Caw niwn tzaljc'ojlal 'oj ac' 'ayin, yic 'oj in c'och 'a ojltac. 'Ay tzaljc'ojlal 'a a tz'ey 'a jun 'ejmn̈ej.</t>
